description: Scale ca. 1:3,000,000. Prime meridian: Philadelphia and London. Relief shown pictorially. Shows the present states of Georgia, Alabama, and Mississippi. description: Relief shown pictorially. Oriented with north to right. Raymond; July 2016. vcFY24

germany. reichsamt für landesaufnahme. hauptvermessungsabteilung xiv, wien
description: Relief shown by hachures, contours, and spot heights. Title from index sheet. Each sheet individually titled and numbered, for example "Gyimes-Pasz, zone 19 kol. XXXIV". Includes various editions of most sheets. Later sheets produced by Kartographisches Institut and the Bundesamt für Eich- und Vermessungswesen. Some sheets reprinted and updated by Hauptvermessungsabteilung XIV. Some sheets mounted on cloth. Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image. Hungarian text on some sheets.

contributors: Austria. Bundesamt für Eich- und Vermessungswesen, cartographer
Germany. Reichsamt für Landesaufnahme. Hauptvermessungsabteilung XIV, Wien, cartographer
notes: Relief shown by hachures, contours, and spot heights.

Includes various editions of most sheets.
Later sheets produced by Kartographisches Institut and the Bundesamt für Eich- und Vermessungswesen. Some sheets reprinted and updated by Hauptvermessungsabteilung XIV.
